bug.summary: backend-updater in v0.6.1 cluster stuck in Pending, trying to mount secret "admin-gcp-sa" in different namespace
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened:
Deployed Kubeflow 0.6.1 on a GKE cluster: kfctl init $NAME cd $NAME kfctl generate k8s kfctl apply k8s
Noticed that the backend-updater StatefulSet in the istio-system namespace is stuck in Pending
backend-updater is in istio-system namespace and attempts to mount a secret named admin-gcp-sa; this Secret does not exist in the istio-system namespace. In earlier versions, the creation of the GCP Service account and the storing the secret for admin-gcp-sa in the kubeflow namespace was automated by kfctl. Now that Istio is set up in the Kubeflow cluster, in its own namespace, is it expected to have to duplicate this secret in istio-system as well as the kubeflow namespace? What did you expect to happen: backend-updater pods to be Running Environment:
Kubeflow version: v0.6.1 kfctl version: 0.6.1 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) GKE
